hero.title: Discover Buenos Aires
hero.subtitle: The city that never sleeps
hero.slide1_description: Discover the city of tango, culture and passion
hero.slide3_description: From colonial to modern, a city that captivates

welcome.subtitle: Welcome
welcome.title: Discover Buenos Aires with me
welcome.intro: Hi! I'm Miguel Murdoch, your tour guide in Buenos Aires. With over 15 years of experience, I invite you to explore the best-kept secrets of this fascinating city.
welcome.paragraph1: Buenos Aires is a city that enchants: its history-filled neighborhoods, passionate tango, world-class gastronomy, and warm people will captivate you from the first moment.
welcome.paragraph2: Whether you're looking for the elegance of Recoleta, the bohemian vibe of San Telmo, the color of La Boca, or the modernity of Palermo, I have the perfect tour for you.
welcome.feature1_desc: Adapted to your interests and pace
welcome.feature2_desc: Morning, afternoon or evening - you choose

tango.subtitle: Art and Culture
tango.title: Buenos Aires Tango
tango.intro: Immerse yourself in the authentic Buenos Aires tango experience. Discover traditional milongas, classes for all levels and spaces where tango is lived intensely.

footer.title: Buenos Aires Guide
footer.description: Your personalized tourist guide to discover the best corners of Buenos Aires.
footer.copyright: Buenos Aires Guide. All rights reserved.

transport.subtitle: Transportation Guide
transport.title: Public Transport
transport.description: The subway is the fastest and most convenient way to move around Buenos Aires. Tap the map to view routes, connections, and tips.
